entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] XAMLC is currently throwing exceptions in RC1 that don't appear to have been throwing in PReview7 #17333
    .NET 8 GA
  • [8.0.100-rc.1.23455.8] dotnet build for windows fails with error NETSDK1083: The specified RuntimeIdentifier "win10-x64" is not recognized #17330
  • Slow Scrolling Performance in CollectionView or ScrollView #17326
  • Automatic Flow Direction Change for Arabic Strings in When Drawing the String in MAUI on Android and Opposite Behavior in Windows. #17323
  • net8 Maui iOS/Android Entry isn't cleared after set bound property value to null #17321
  • Wrong nullable annotations in IMediaPicker #17320
  • Pan not detected vertically when the recognizer is inside of a scrollview #17319
  • Use MAUI essentials in non-MAUI project (.NET 8 preview) #17317
  • `CollectionView` repeats first several items from `ItemsSource` #17316
  • `SwipeView` needs an activation threshold property to make buttons clickable #17315
  • We should set the FontSize with correct TextAttribute name. #17314

Closed

  • Content page styles are not loaded on first page navigation on iOS #14676
  • ListView sets Cell's BindingContext to self, causing multiple warnings and/or InvalidCastExceptions #13754
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Xaml.Diagnostics.BindingDiagnostics warnings are displayed for a grouped CollectionView with an ItemTemplate #15579
    Backlog
  • CollectionView pushed off the screen iOS & Android #16783
    .NET 8 GA
  • Finish CI Automation for WinUI Device Tests #14696
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Add MSI transport nugets to sign verify #17335
  • Removed references to GraphicsTester.Skia.Tizen from Maui-dev and Maui-vscode sln files. #17334
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Added integration test for maui blazor maccatalyst codesign verification. #17331
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/testing, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • Copy Windows MauiAssets to the publish folder for Unpackaged #17329
    area/single project ☝️
  • [build] Remove LangVersion #17327
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Adjust tap tests so they can work on Windows #17325
  • Bump the androidx group with 5 updates #17322
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] 20230912 Android Ecosystem updates AndroidX #17318

Merged

  • [build] Remove LangVersion #17328
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add RC1 to our Issue Template #17332
  • [build] Don't use internal feeds on main #17324
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17311
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Add size update for Shell Popup Overlay after rotation #15866
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Enable requesting the full preview size on iOS drag shadow & iOS and Windows Samples #17282
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • [X] do not register srcinfo for xaml-defined values #17230
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • Fix typo in build.sh #17305
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Update the macios dependencies to new package names. #17267
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, stale, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
